Service Details: - Offers safe and supportive transitional housing for women and youth wishing to make positive lifestyle changes- Participants can access this continuous-intake abstinence program with just 5 days ‘clean time’ from their addiction and start to embark on the road to recovery- Program highlights include: a warm, safe and supportive transitional living, drug and alcohol free environment, homes run by experienced live-in House Directors/Client Support Workers, learning basic life skills, access to NOW Canada’s Essentials Program and all NOW Canada programs- Also offers Follow Care Suites for independent living for participants who have graduated from the Essentials program
Address & Map: 2970 Tutt StKelowna, BC     V1Y 2H5View MapQuest Map
